InstructionData.Title: ATMO DISP
InstructionData.Author: onebit
InstructionData.Instructions:
# Life Support 1.0 # https://github.com/dtandersen/sta alias GasSensor d0 alias O2Disp d1 alias CO2Disp d2 alias NDisp d3 alias H2Display d4 alias XDisplay d5
alias pressure r3 # room pressure alias ratio r2 # ratio of gas alias partial r1 # partial pressure of gas
init: brdns O2Disp 2 s O2Disp Mode 0 brdns CO2Disp 2 s CO2Disp Mode 0 brdns NDisp 2 s NDisp Mode 0 brdns H2Display 2 s H2Display Mode 0 brdns XDisplay 2 s XDisplay Mode 0
start: l pressure GasSensor Pressure
o2: bdns O2Disp co2 l ratio GasSensor RatioOxygen mul partial ratio pressure s O2Disp Setting partial
co2: bdns CO2Disp n2 l ratio GasSensor RatioCarbonDioxide mul partial ratio pressure # pp of co2 s CO2Disp Setting partial
n2: bdns NDisp h2 l ratio GasSensor RatioNitrogen mul partial ratio pressure # pp of co2 s NDisp Setting partial
h2: bdns H2Display x l ratio GasSensor RatioVolatiles mul partial ratio pressure # pp of co2 s H2Display Setting partial
x: bdns XDisplay done l ratio GasSensor RatioPollutant mul partial ratio pressure # pp of co2 s XDisplay Setting partial
done: yield j start
